fields.label: First Name
fields.help_text: Enter the primary applicant's legal first name as it appears on official documents

fields.label: Middle Name
fields.help_text: Enter your middle name as it appears on your government-issued identification. Leave blank if you don't have a middle name.

fields.label: Last Name
fields.help_text: Enter your legal last name exactly as it appears on your government-issued identification

fields.label: Suffix
fields.help_text: Optional name suffix (e.g., Jr., Sr., II, III, IV, Esq.)

fields.label: Social Security Number
fields.help_text: Enter your 9-digit Social Security Number. This information is required for identity verification purposes.

fields.label: Date of Birth
fields.help_text: Enter your date of birth as it appears on your government-issued identification

fields.label: Email Address
fields.help_text: Enter a valid email address where we can reach you

fields.label: Primary Phone
fields.help_text: Enter your primary contact phone number

fields.label: Alternate Phone Number
fields.help_text: Optional secondary contact number for the applicant

fields.label: Government ID Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of government-issued identification you will provide

fields.label: ID Number
fields.help_text: Enter the identification number from your selected government-issued ID document

fields.label: Issuing State
fields.help_text: Select the state that issued your identification document

fields.label: ID Expiration Date
fields.help_text: Enter the expiration date shown on your identification document

fields.label: Street Address
fields.help_text: Enter your street address (line 1)

fields.label: Apartment/Unit/Suite
fields.help_text: Optional: Enter your apartment, unit, or suite number if applicable

fields.label: City
fields.help_text: Enter the city of your current address

fields.label: State
fields.help_text: Select the state for your current address

fields.label: ZIP Code
fields.help_text: Enter your 5-digit ZIP code or ZIP+4 format

fields.label: Residence Type
fields.help_text: Select whether you own your home, rent, live with family, or have another living arrangement

fields.label: Years at Current Address
fields.help_text: Enter the number of years you have lived at your current address. You may use decimals for partial years (e.g., 1.5 for one and a half years).

fields.label: Monthly Rent/Mortgage Payment
fields.help_text: Enter your monthly rent or mortgage payment amount in dollars

fields.label: Co-Applicant
fields.help_text: Check this box if there is a co-applicant applying for this loan with you

fields.label: Co-Applicant First Name
fields.help_text: First name of the co-applicant applying for this loan (only if there is a co-applicant)

fields.label: Co-Applicant Middle Name
fields.help_text: Enter the co-applicant's middle name or initial. This field is optional.

fields.label: Co-Applicant Last Name
fields.help_text: Required only if there is a co-applicant (spouse, business partner, or guarantor). The co-applicant's credit history will be considered in the evaluation.

fields.label: Co-Applicant Social Security Number
fields.help_text: Enter the Social Security Number of the co-applicant. This field is only required if there is a co-applicant for this loan.

fields.label: Co-Applicant Date of Birth
fields.help_text: Enter the date of birth for the co-applicant (spouse, business partner, or guarantor). Required only if there is a co-applicant.

fields.label: Co-Applicant Phone Number
fields.help_text: Phone number for the co-applicant (spouse, business partner, or guarantor)

fields.label: Co-Applicant Email Address
fields.help_text: Enter the email address for the co-applicant on this loan application

fields.label: Relationship to Primary Applicant
fields.help_text: Select how the co-applicant is related to the primary applicant on this loan application

fields.label: Current Employer
fields.help_text: Provide the legal name of your current employer or company you work for

fields.label: Job Title
fields.placeholder: e.g., Software Engineer, Manager, Sales Associate
fields.help_text: Enter your current job title or position at your employer

fields.label: Years Employed
fields.help_text: Enter the number of years you have been employed at your current position. If less than one year, enter 0 and specify months in the adjacent field.

fields.label: Months at Current Employer
fields.help_text: Enter the number of months (0-11) you've been employed at your current job. Use with 'Years Employed' to indicate total employment duration.

fields.label: Current Employer Address
fields.help_text: Enter the complete address of your current employer

fields.label: Employer Phone
fields.help_text: Enter your current employer's contact phone number

fields.label: Annual Salary/Income
fields.help_text: Enter your current annual salary or income in dollars. Do not include commas or dollar signs.

fields.label: Employment Type
fields.help_text: Select your current employment status. If you have been at your current job for less than 2 years, you may need to provide previous employment information.

fields.label: Previous Employer Name
fields.help_text: Only required if you have been at your current employer for less than 2 years

fields.label: Job Title
fields.help_text: Enter your job title at your previous employer. Only required if you have been at your current employer for less than 2 years.

fields.label: Years at Previous Employer
fields.help_text: Enter the number of years you worked at your previous employer (only required if you've been at your current employer for less than 2 years)

fields.label: Legal Business Name
fields.placeholder: Enter the official registered business name
fields.help_text: Provide the complete legal name of your business as it appears on official registration documents. If the business is not yet established, indicate 'Startup' for the business type.

fields.label: DBA / Trade Name
fields.placeholder: Enter DBA or trade name if applicable
fields.help_text: Enter the "Doing Business As" (DBA) or trade name only if it differs from your legal business name. Leave blank if not applicable.

fields.label: Federal EIN (Tax ID)
fields.help_text: Enter your 9-digit Employer Identification Number (EIN) assigned by the IRS. Format: XX-XXXXXXX

fields.label: Business Entity Type
fields.help_text: Select the legal structure of your business. This determines how your business is taxed and your personal liability. Common options include Sole Proprietorship (individual owner), LLC (limited liability company), or Corporation.

fields.label: Industry / NAICS Code
fields.help_text: Select the primary industry classification for your business. NAICS (North American Industry Classification System) codes are used for statistical and tax purposes.

fields.label: Date Established
fields.help_text: Enter the date when your business was officially established or incorporated

fields.label: State of Incorporation
fields.help_text: Select the state where your business was incorporated or formed

fields.label: Number of Employees
fields.help_text: Enter the total number of employees in your business

fields.label: Business Address - Street
fields.help_text: Enter the street address where your business is located (street number, street name, and unit/suite if applicable)

fields.label: City
fields.help_text: Enter the city where your business is located

fields.label: State
fields.help_text: Enter the two-letter state abbreviation for the business address

fields.label: ZIP Code
fields.help_text: Enter the ZIP code for the business address

fields.label: Business Phone
fields.help_text: Enter the primary contact phone number for your business

fields.label: Business Fax Number
fields.help_text: Optional fax number for business correspondence

fields.label: Business Website
fields.help_text: Enter your business website URL (optional)

fields.label: Owner 1 Name
fields.help_text: Enter the full legal name of the primary business owner

fields.label: Title
fields.help_text: Enter the title or role of Owner 1 within the organization (e.g., President, CEO, Partner, Member).

fields.label: Ownership Percentage
fields.help_text: Enter the percentage of ownership for this individual (0-100)

fields.label: Social Security Number (Owner 1)
fields.help_text: Enter the Social Security Number for the first owner. This information is required for tax reporting purposes.

fields.label: Owner 2 Name
fields.placeholder: Enter full name of second owner
fields.help_text: Provide the full legal name of the second business owner if applicable

fields.label: Title
fields.help_text: Enter the title or role of the second owner in the business

fields.label: Owner 2 Percentage Owned
fields.help_text: Enter the ownership percentage for Owner 2. Total ownership across all owners must equal 100%. Only include owners with 20% or more ownership.

fields.label: Owner 2 - Social Security Number
fields.help_text: Enter the Social Security Number for the second owner. Required only if there is a second owner.

fields.label: Owner 3 Name
fields.help_text: Full legal name of the third business owner (if applicable)

fields.label: Title
fields.help_text: Enter the professional title or role of Owner 3 in the business

fields.label: Owner 3 Ownership Percentage
fields.help_text: Enter the percentage of ownership for Owner 3. Only include owners with 20% or more ownership. All ownership percentages must total 100%.

fields.label: Owner 3 Social Security Number
fields.help_text: Enter the Social Security Number for the third owner. Format: XXX-XX-XXXX

fields.label: Loan Amount Requested
fields.help_text: Enter the total amount you wish to borrow. This should reflect the funding needed for the purpose selected above.

fields.label: Purpose of Loan
fields.help_text: Select the primary reason you are applying for this business loan. Choose the option that best describes how you intend to use the funds.

fields.label: Purpose of Loan
fields.help_text: Select the primary reason you are applying for this business loan. You may choose one or more options that apply.

fields.label: Purpose of Loan
fields.help_text: Select the primary reason you are applying for this loan. Choose the option that best describes how you plan to use the funds.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for your loan request. Choose the option that best describes how you intend to use the funds.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for your loan. Choose 'Other' if none of the standard options apply and provide details.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for this loan. If your purpose is not listed, select 'Other' and provide details.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for this loan. If your purpose is not listed, select 'Other' and provide details.

fields.label: Loan Purpose
fields.help_text: Select the primary purpose for your loan. If your purpose isn't listed, choose "Other" and provide details in the text field below.

fields.label: Other Loan Purpose
fields.placeholder: Please specify the purpose of your loan
fields.help_text: If you selected 'Other' as your loan purpose, please provide details about how you intend to use the loan funds.

fields.label: Preferred Loan Term
fields.help_text: Select your preferred loan repayment period. Short-term loans typically have higher monthly payments but lower total interest, while long-term loans have lower monthly payments but higher total interest.

fields.label: Preferred Loan Term
fields.help_text: Select your preferred loan term duration. Medium-term loans typically range from 1-5 years, while long-term loans extend from 5-10 years.

fields.label: Preferred Loan Term
fields.help_text: Select your preferred loan term length. This helps us tailor financing options to your needs.

fields.label: Loan Term Preference
fields.help_text: Select your preferred loan term structure. Choose the option that best fits your financial needs and risk tolerance.

fields.label: Interest Rate Preference
fields.help_text: Select your preferred interest rate type for this loan. Choose fixed rate for consistent payments or variable rate for potentially lower initial rates.

fields.label: Interest Rate Preference
fields.help_text: Select your preferred interest rate type for this loan. Fixed rates remain constant throughout the loan term, while variable rates may fluctuate with market conditions. Choose 'No Preference' if you'd like guidance from your lender.

fields.label: Interest Rate Preference
fields.help_text: Select your preferred interest rate type for this loan. Fixed rates remain constant throughout the loan term, while variable rates may fluctuate with market conditions. Choose "No Preference" if you'd like guidance from your loan officer.

fields.label: Date Funds Needed By
fields.help_text: Select the date by which you need the loan funds to be disbursed

fields.label: Checking Accounts
fields.help_text: Enter the total current balance of all your checking accounts in dollars

fields.label: Savings / Money Market
fields.help_text: Enter the total current balance of all savings and money market accounts in dollars

fields.label: Investment Assets
fields.help_text: Include the total dollar value of your stocks, bonds, mutual funds, and other investment accounts (exclude retirement accounts listed separately).

fields.label: Retirement Accounts (401k, IRA)
fields.help_text: Enter the total current value of all retirement accounts including 401(k), IRA, Roth IRA, and similar accounts. Enter 0 if none.

fields.label: Real Estate (market value)
fields.help_text: Enter the current market value of all real estate properties you own, including your primary residence, investment properties, and land.

fields.label: Vehicles (Market Value)
fields.help_text: Enter the current market value of all vehicles you own (cars, motorcycles, boats, RVs, etc.). If none, enter 0.

fields.label: Other Assets
fields.help_text: Enter the total value of any other assets not listed above, such as investments, retirement accounts, savings, or personal property.

fields.label: Total Assets
fields.help_text: Enter the total value of all your assets in dollars. This typically includes cash, real estate, vehicles, investments, and other valuable property.

fields.label: Mortgage Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the current outstanding balance on your mortgage(s). If you have multiple mortgages, enter the total combined balance.

fields.label: Auto Loans
fields.help_text: Enter the current outstanding balance of all auto loans (car, truck, motorcycle, etc.)

fields.label: Credit Card Balances
fields.help_text: Enter the total outstanding balance across all credit cards

fields.label: Student Loans
fields.help_text: Enter the total outstanding balance of all student loans in dollars. If you have no student loans, enter 0.

fields.label: Other Liabilities
fields.help_text: Enter any additional liabilities not covered in other categories (e.g., personal loans, tax debts, medical bills)

fields.label: Total Liabilities
fields.help_text: Enter the sum of all your liabilities including credit card balances, student loans, and other debts. This should equal the total of all liability items listed above.

fields.label: Net Worth
fields.help_text: Your net worth is calculated as Total Assets minus Total Liabilities. Enter the amount in dollars.

fields.label: Gross Revenue
fields.help_text: Enter the total gross revenue for your business from the most recent fiscal year. This is the total income before deducting cost of goods sold or operating expenses.

fields.label: Fiscal Year End
fields.help_text: Enter the month and year when your business's fiscal year ends (e.g., 12/2023 for December 2023)

fields.label: Cost of Goods Sold
fields.help_text: Enter the total cost of goods sold (COGS) for the most recent fiscal year. This includes direct costs attributable to the production of goods sold by your business.

fields.label: Gross Profit
fields.help_text: Enter the gross profit amount in dollars. Gross profit is calculated as total revenue minus cost of goods sold. For startups, provide projected figures clearly marked as estimates.

fields.label: Total Operating Expenses
fields.help_text: Enter the total operating expenses for your most recent fiscal year, excluding cost of goods sold. Operating expenses typically include rent, utilities, salaries, marketing, insurance, and other business overhead costs.

fields.label: Net Income
fields.help_text: Enter your business's net income in dollars. If you are a startup, provide projected figures clearly marked as estimates.

fields.label: Prior Year Gross Revenue
fields.help_text: Enter your business's total gross revenue from the previous year for comparison purposes. This should be the total income before deducting expenses.

fields.label: Prior Year Net Income
fields.help_text: Enter the net income from the previous fiscal year. This should match the net income reported on your prior year's financial statements.

fields.label: Primary Business Bank
fields.placeholder: Enter your bank name (e.g., Chase, Wells Fargo)
fields.help_text: Enter the name of the financial institution where you maintain your primary business banking account.

fields.label: Business Bank Account Number
fields.placeholder: Enter your business bank account number
fields.help_text: Provide the account number for your primary business banking account

fields.label: Average Monthly Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the average monthly balance of your business bank account in dollars

fields.label: I am an existing First National Bank customer
fields.help_text: Check this box if you currently have an account with First National Bank. If yes, please provide your account number in the field below.

fields.label: Existing Account Number
fields.help_text: If you are an existing First National Bank customer, please provide your account number.

fields.label: Creditor 1 - Name
fields.help_text: Enter the name of the financial institution or creditor for your first outstanding business debt

fields.label: Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the current outstanding balance for this debt in dollars

fields.label: Monthly Payment
fields.help_text: Enter the monthly payment amount for this debt in dollars

fields.label: Interest Rate (%)
fields.help_text: Enter the annual interest rate percentage for this debt

fields.label: Creditor 2 Name
fields.help_text: Enter the name of the second creditor for outstanding business debts (e.g., bank name, lender, or financial institution)

fields.label: Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the current outstanding balance for this debt or obligation in dollars

fields.label: Monthly Payment
fields.help_text: Enter the monthly payment amount for this debt in dollars

fields.label: Debt 2 - Interest Rate
fields.help_text: Enter the annual interest rate percentage for this debt (without the % symbol)

fields.label: Creditor 3 Name
fields.help_text: Enter the name of the third creditor for outstanding business debts (e.g., bank name, lender, or financial institution)

fields.label: Balance
fields.help_text: Enter the current outstanding balance for this debt obligation in dollars

fields.label: Monthly Payment
fields.help_text: Enter the monthly payment amount for this debt in dollars

fields.label: Interest Rate
fields.help_text: Enter the annual interest rate as a percentage (e.g., 5.5 for 5.5%)

fields.label: Primary Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the primary type of collateral being offered to secure the loan. Choose the category that best represents the main asset being pledged.

fields.label: Primary Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the primary type of collateral being used to secure the loan. Common types include inventory, equipment/machinery, accounts receivable, or real estate.

fields.label: Primary Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the primary type of collateral being used to secure this loan. Multiple types may be selected if applicable.

fields.label: Type of Collateral
fields.help_text: Select one or more types of collateral you are offering to secure the loan. Common options include inventory, accounts receivable, vehicles/fleet, or cash savings/CDs.

fields.label: Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of collateral you are offering to secure the loan. Multiple selections may be possible.

fields.label: Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of collateral you are offering to secure this loan. Choose "None / Unsecured Request" if you are not providing collateral.

fields.label: Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of collateral being offered to secure this loan. Choose 'None / Unsecured Request' if no collateral is available.

fields.label: Collateral Type
fields.help_text: Select the type of collateral you are offering to secure this loan. If you are not offering collateral, select "None / Unsecured Request".

fields.label: Collateral Description
fields.placeholder: Describe the collateral (e.g., property address, vehicle details, equipment)
fields.help_text: Provide a detailed description of the collateral being used to secure the loan, including identifying information such as addresses, VIN numbers, serial numbers, or other relevant details.

fields.label: Estimated Value
fields.help_text: Enter the estimated current market value of the collateral in US dollars

fields.label: Existing Liens ($)
fields.help_text: Enter the total dollar amount of existing liens or encumbrances currently on the collateral

fields.label: Collateral Location
fields.placeholder: Enter the physical address or location of the collateral
fields.help_text: Provide the complete physical address where the collateral (asset being used to secure the loan) is located. This helps the lender verify and access the collateral if necessary.

fields.label: Collateral Description (Item 2)
fields.placeholder: Describe the collateral (e.g., equipment, real estate, inventory)
fields.help_text: Provide a detailed description of the second collateral item being offered to secure the loan, including type, condition, and any identifying information.

fields.label: Estimated Value
fields.help_text: Provide the estimated current market value of the additional collateral in US dollars

fields.label: Existing Liens ($)
fields.help_text: Enter the total dollar amount of any existing liens on this collateral (e.g., mortgages, loans, or other claims)

fields.label: Primary Applicant Personal Guarantee
fields.help_text: Check this box if the co-applicant agrees to provide a personal guarantee for this application

fields.label: Other Guarantor
fields.help_text: Check this box if there is an additional guarantor beyond the personal guarantee. A separate guarantee form must be attached.

fields.label: Other Guarantor
fields.help_text: Select if you have an additional guarantor not listed above. You must attach a separate guarantee form for this guarantor.

fields.label: Have you declared bankruptcy in the past 7 years?
fields.help_text: If you answer 'Yes', you must provide a written explanation on a separate sheet and attach it to this application. False statements may result in denial of the application and may constitute a federal crime.

fields.label: No, I have not declared bankruptcy
fields.help_text: Check this box if you have NOT filed for bankruptcy in the past 7 years

fields.label: Have you had property foreclosed upon or given title or deed in lieu thereof in the last 7 years?
fields.help_text: Select 'Yes' if either the primary applicant or co-applicant has experienced foreclosure or given a deed in lieu of foreclosure within the past 7 years. If you answer 'Yes', you must provide a written explanation on a separate sheet.

fields.label: No foreclosure proceedings
fields.help_text: Check this box if there are no foreclosure proceedings against you or your property

fields.label: Are you currently involved in any lawsuit?
fields.help_text: Indicate whether you are currently a party to any pending lawsuit or legal proceeding.

fields.label: No pending lawsuits
fields.help_text: Check this box if you have no pending lawsuits or legal actions

fields.label: Are you presently subject to a tax lien?
fields.help_text: Indicate if you are currently subject to any federal, state, or local tax liens. A tax lien is a legal claim by a government entity against your property when you fail to pay tax debt.

fields.label: No tax liens
fields.help_text: Check this box to indicate you do not have any outstanding federal tax liens or other tax debt.

fields.label: Currently Delinquent on Any Federal Debt - Yes
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are currently delinquent on any federal debt (e.g., federal taxes, student loans, child support, or other obligations). If you are not delinquent, leave this unchecked.

fields.label: No, I am not delinquent on any federal debt
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are NOT currently delinquent on any federal debt obligations

fields.label: Yes, I have been convicted of a felony
fields.help_text: Check this box if you have been convicted of a felony. This information may be required for background check or licensing purposes.

fields.label: No - I have not been convicted of a felony
fields.help_text: Check this box if you have NOT been convicted of a felony. This is typically a required disclosure for official applications.

fields.label: Yes, I have an obligation to file a return
fields.help_text: Select this option if you are required to file a tax return based on your income, filing status, or other circumstances.

fields.label: No
fields.help_text: Select if you are not declaring an obligation

fields.label: Other Applications - Yes
fields.help_text: Check this box if you have other applications pending or approved with immigration authorities

fields.label: No other applications filed
fields.help_text: Check this box if you have not filed any other applications or petitions for this beneficiary

fields.label: Are you employed by or have you worked for the government?
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are currently employed by or have previously worked for any government entity (federal, state, or local).

fields.label: No - Not a Government Official
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are NOT a government official or public servant. This is typically part of a declaration or disclosure requirement.

fields.label: Yes, this transaction involves a related party
fields.help_text: Check this box if the transaction involves a related party (e.g., family member, business associate, or entity in which you have an ownership interest)

fields.label: No, I am not a related party
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are not a related party to the organization or transaction. This is typically part of a declaration section where you must indicate your relationship status.

fields.label: Explanation
fields.placeholder: Provide additional explanation or details here...
fields.help_text: Use this field to provide any additional explanations, clarifications, or details related to your declaration.

fields.label: Personal Tax Documents
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are providing personal tax documents

fields.label: Personal Tax Document
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are submitting personal tax documentation

fields.label: Business Tax Document
fields.help_text: Check this box if you need to submit business tax documents

fields.label: Business Tax Document
fields.help_text: Check if you are providing business tax documentation

fields.label: Financial Statement
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are submitting a financial statement as part of your documentation

fields.label: Bank Statements
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are submitting bank statements as supporting documentation

fields.label: Personal Bank Statements
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are providing personal bank statements as supporting documentation

fields.label: Business Plan
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are including a business plan with your application

fields.label: Articles of Incorporation/Organization
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are submitting articles of incorporation or organization with this form

fields.label: Document Licenses
fields.help_text: Select if you have professional licenses or certifications to document

fields.label: Lease Agreement
fields.help_text: Check if you are providing a lease agreement as supporting documentation

fields.label: Copy of Document ID
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are providing a copy of a document ID or identification

fields.label: Insurance Documents
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are including insurance documentation with your submission

fields.label: Accounts Payable/Accounts Receivable Documentation
fields.help_text: Check this box if you are submitting accounts payable or accounts receivable documentation

fields.label: Collateral Documents
fields.help_text: Check if collateral documentation is included or required

fields.label: Additional Information
fields.placeholder: Provide any business achievements, contracts, growth projections, or circumstances you'd like to explain...
fields.help_text: Use this space to highlight any information that may strengthen your application, such as recent business achievements, existing contracts, projected growth, or any special circumstances that should be considered during evaluation.

fields.label: How did you hear about our lending program?
fields.help_text: Please select the source through which you learned about our lending services. If you were referred by someone, you'll be asked to provide their name in the next field.

fields.label: Referral Name
fields.placeholder: Enter the name of the person who referred you
fields.help_text: If you were referred to our lending program by someone, please provide their name here.

fields.label: I agree to the terms and conditions
fields.help_text: You must agree to the terms and conditions to proceed with this application

fields.label: I agree to a credit check
fields.help_text: By checking this box, you authorize us to perform a credit check as part of your application review

fields.label: I agree to electronic signature
fields.help_text: By checking this box, you consent to sign this document electronically

fields.label: Print Name (Primary Applicant)
fields.help_text: Please print your full legal name as it appears on official documents. This should match the signature above.

fields.label: Primary Applicant Signature
fields.help_text: By signing, you authorize credit report inquiries and confirm the accuracy of the information provided in this application.

fields.label: Date Signed
fields.help_text: Enter the date when the primary applicant signed this document

fields.label: Co-Applicant/Guarantor Printed Name
fields.help_text: Enter the full printed name of the co-applicant or guarantor. This should match the signature provided above.

fields.label: Co-Applicant / Guarantor Signature
fields.help_text: Sign here if you are a co-applicant or guarantor on this loan application. This field is only required if there is a co-applicant or guarantor.

fields.label: Date Signed
fields.help_text: Enter the date when you signed this document

fields.label: Loan Officer Name
fields.help_text: For bank use only. This section must be completed by the assigned loan officer.

fields.label: Officer ID
fields.help_text: Enter the unique identification number assigned to the loan officer processing this application.

fields.label: Bank Branch
fields.help_text: Provide the specific branch location or branch number where your account is held

fields.label: Date Received
fields.help_text: Enter the date the bank received the application

fields.label: Application Number
fields.help_text: Unique identifier assigned to this bank application

fields.label: Application Status
fields.help_text: Select the current status of the bank application. This indicates where the application is in the review process.

fields.label: Bank Notes
fields.placeholder: Enter any additional notes or comments about your bank account
fields.help_text: Use this field to record any special instructions, account details, or other relevant information about your banking arrangements
